Title: The Other Vibrator
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Billy Finnegan, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace and Frankie send a cease and desist letter to the company that stole their idea. A homophobic church group protest Robert's play rehearsals.
